name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
description: Toasted baguette slices topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy dip made with spinach, artichokes, and a blend of cheeses, served with tortilla chips.

name: Chicken Satay Skewers
description: Grilled chicken skewers marinated in a peanut sauce, served with a side of cucumber salad.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Breaded mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce for dipping.

name: Shrimp Cocktail
description: Chilled shrimp served with a tangy cocktail sauce and lemon wedges.
